definition: Xiang'an district of Xiamen city 廈門市|厦门市[Xia4 men2 shi4] (Amoy), Fujian
to soar/to glide/variant of 詳|详[xiang2]
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: Xiang'an is the key farmland base of Xiamen.
sentences.chinese: 翔安區是廈門市主要農作物生產基地。

sentences.english: This project is situated at north of Xiang'an District, Xiamen.
sentences.chinese: 該項目位於廈門市翔安區北側。
